item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-31
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Oh hooray it's pouring again. Is this what living in Seattle is like? #
  • I'm at Met bar. #
  • Cygwin you make using windows so much nicer. I would give you a cookie if you had a mouth. #
  • Safari you crashed for the last time, back to Firefox. #
  • RT: Sirloin burger w/slice pastrami, bl chz n foie soubise on grilld brioche; pommes frites! (via @LESPALIER) #
  • RT - Study: Redheads' extra pain may cause fear of dentists - #cnn (via @vinofordinner) #
  • Gmail is now crashing firefox, what's up with that? Anyone else have this issue? #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
